ValidationRule.description: Restricts the Loss Reason from being changed to Closed Admin by anyone except a system administrator
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( !$User.Bypass_Validation__c,
left($User.ProfileId, 15) <> left( $Label.Profile_SystemAdministrator , 15),
ispickval( Loss_Reason__c , "Closed Admin"),
ischanged(Loss_Reason__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only a system administrator can select the Closed Admin loss reason. Please select a different loss reason or submit a request for support.
